column5: Took jr over to Trenton so he could have his first shot at perch throught the ice.He loved it.Kept about 25 for supper.  Cant wait to get him out again.  Thanks to Fish Finder Charters for the great day.
wow good haul Jr.  your catch in the minnow bucket?
it's great taking kids out fishing looks like you did well
It is Terry... when you taking me out next?  Some great Father Son time there for sure DGC. And a good meal to boot. Great to see the tradition being passed on.
WOW looks like a great day for you guys, congratulations  There some real nice chunky ones on that pic Thanks for sharing Leechman
